caption.p: Duration of temperatures suitable for malaria transmission. Duration of malaria season is given as the number of continuous months suitable for transmission, for the top 25% of suitability (most, a and b) and the full 100% range (suitable, b and d), as predicted by the Mordecai et al. ( 2013) model, in current ( a and b) and 2080 ( c and d) climate conditions.
